decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of countermagic, removal spells, and card draw to control the game and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Atraxa, Grand Unifier serves as the commander to provide additional value and flexibility. The deck includes a variety of versatile and efficient spells such as Counterspell, Force of Will, Fatal Push, and Supreme Verdict to deal with threats and maintain control over the battlefield. Card advantage is gained through cards like Brainstorm, Fact or Fiction, and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, while Demonic Tutor and Tainted Pact allow for finding specific answers or win conditions. Overall, the deck aims to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory through careful resource management and strategic decision-making.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counter spells, removal, card draw, and tempo plays. Eris, Roar of the Storm is used as the commander to support this strategy. The deck includes a wide range of spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan, such as Counterspell, Force of Will, and Mana Leak. It also has removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Abrade to deal with threats on the board. Additionally, there are card draw spells like Brainstorm and Fact or Fiction to ensure the player maintains resources and can find key cards. Overall, the goal is to outsmart and outmaneuver the opponent while maintaining control of the game.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, and disruption. With a variety of powerful spells and versatile creatures, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while ensuring the commander, Kellan, Inquisitive Prodigy, remains safe and active on the battlefield. By utilizing cards like Treachery, Cryptic Command, and Force of Will, the deck can effectively control the flow of the game and dictate the pace of play. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and True-Name Nemesis for added versatility and resilience in the face of opposing threats.

The key strategy of this deck is to utilize a combination of creatures, enchantments, and spells to protect and enhance Light-Paws, Emperor's Voice, while also controlling the opponent's board. By utilizing cards like Giver of Runes, Mother of Runes, and Selfless Savior, the deck aims to keep Light-Paws safe from removal spells and combat damage. Enchantments like Ethereal Armor, Daybreak Coronet, and Spirit Mantle can quickly turn Light-Paws into a powerful threat, allowing for quick wins through commander damage. Additionally, the deck includes a range of disruptive spells like Silence, Containment Priest, and Drannith Magistrate to disrupt the opponent's game plan and buy time to establish a winning board state.

The main focus of this deck is to create a powerful combo utilizing Prossh, Skyraider of Kher as the commander. The deck includes a variety of cards that provide mana acceleration, creature sacrifice outlets, and token generators to fuel the combo. By assembling the right combination of cards and utilizing Prossh's ability to create tokens based on the amount of mana spent to cast him, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of tokens and drain their life total with effects like Blood Artist and Purphoros, God of the Forge. The deck also includes disruption and removal spells to control the game and protect the combo.

The deck focuses on a combination of aggressive plays and utilizing the abilities of Slimefoot and Squee to generate value and overwhelm opponents. It includes a range of creature threats, removal spells, and mana accelerants to maintain board presence and apply pressure. The inclusion of cards like Goblin Bombardment and Animate Dead allows for additional reach and recursion strategies, while cards like Chord of Calling and Eldritch Evolution provide flexibility in finding key pieces. The deck is built to efficiently deploy threats, disrupt opponents, and leverage the synergies between Slimefoot and Squee to create a powerful and proactive game plan in the Commander format.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game early on and disrupt your opponent's strategy while also putting pressure on them with evasive creatures. By utilizing a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures like Spell Queller and Tithe, you can constantly disrupt your opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like True-Name Nemesis and Spectral Adversary provide a strong clock to close out the game quickly once you have established control. The deck aims to out-value your opponent by making efficient trades and maintaining card advantage through cards like Vendilion Clique and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. Ultimately, the goal is to maintain control of the game and secure a victory through a combination of disruption and aggression.

The focus of this deck is to control the game by disrupting your opponent's plans while also setting up your own win condition. With Eris, Roar of the Storm as your commander, you have access to a wide range of instants and sorceries that can counter your opponent's spells, deal damage to their creatures, draw cards, and manipulate the board state. The goal is to outmaneuver your opponent, slowing them down with counterspells and removal spells while digging for your key cards. By carefully managing your resources and making strategic decisions, you can slowly build up your advantage and secure victory through a combination of controlling the board and dealing direct damage.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, bounce spells, and disruptive spells while continuously drawing cards and generating value with Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel. The deck aims to keep the opponent off balance by countering their key spells, bouncing their threats, and tapping down their creatures. Using a mix of permission spells, card draw, and disruptive effects, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and maintain control of the game until it can win with evasive threats like True-Name Nemesis or through incremental damage with Malcolm. The deck is focused on disrupting the opponent's game plan and drawing into the necessary pieces to secure victory.

The primary focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. Marath, Will of the Wild serves as the commander, providing a versatile tool for dealing with threats on the board. The deck includes a mix of powerful creatures such as Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker and Scavenging Ooze, as well as key support cards like Birthing Pod and Swords to Plowshares. Additionally, the deck features various mana accelerants like Bloom Tender and Utopia Sprawl to ensure a fast start and consistent mana base. With a focus on generating value through creature synergies and removal options, this deck aims to establish board dominance and close out games quickly.
